title: 2008 Bulgarian Supercup
text: The 2008 Bulgarian Supercup was the sixth <a href="Bulgarian%20Supercup">Bulgarian Supercup</a> match, a <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> match which was contested between the <a href="Bulgarian%20A%20Football%20Group">A Group</a> champion, <a href="PFC%20CSKA%20Sofia">CSKA Sofia</a>, and the winner of <a href="Bulgarian%20Cup">Bulgarian Cup</a>, <a href="PFC%20Litex%20Lovech">Litex Lovech</a>. The match was held on 3 August 2008 at the <a href="Vasil%20Levski%20National%20Stadium">Vasil Levski National Stadium</a> in <a href="Sofia">Sofia</a>, <a href="Bulgaria">Bulgaria</a>. CSKA beat Litex 1–0 to win their third Bulgarian Supercup.
